p: Oehlke et al. [ 33] prepared SLNs with ferulic acid (FA) and tocopherol (Toc). The different formulations, containing up to 2.8 mg g −1 of FA or Toc, were stable for at least 15 weeks of storage at room temperature. The authors concluded that these SLNs are suitable as food additives where a gradual release of the active compound could be beneficial.
